short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So that Lexi can be reminded why Tommy likes her so much every time she opens a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tommy really likes Lexi, and he wants her to be constantly reminded of that. So, whenever Lexi opens up a new tab, which she tends to do pretty often, she'll be reminded of one of the many things that Tommy likes about her!
